New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers became the 4th team to start a season 15-0
James Harden surpassed Ray Allen for 2nd all-time in 3-pointers
Key Match Events: Darius Garland led the Cavaliers with 25 points and 12 assists
Ty Jerome matched his career-high in points and assists
Evan Mobley (23 pts, 11 reb) and Jarrett Allen (21 pts, 15 reb) added double-doubles
Charlotte Hornets made a three-point game entering the 4th quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland Cavaliers' 15-0 start matches the second-best in NBA history
James Harden's milestone compared to Ray Allen and Stephen Curry
